name: Grimfel
disclosureNotes: In the video for Beautiful Mess https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N74CR3Wg1ro, the description states: “Vocal processing: Kits (AI assisted), Antares Auto-Tune, Metamorph, Melodyne. Production: Ableton Live, AI for modulations, loops and samples.”
markerNotes:
The X account https://x.com/GrimfelOfficial posts frequently in support of AI in art, for example "The picture looks great even if its AI. Who pays $500 for art anyway?" https://x.com/GrimfelOfficial/status/1701582025822548156 and 
“I have to laugh that goths of all people are crying the most about AI in music” https://x.com/GrimfelOfficial/status/2015998361371820438.
